description: Bring this multi-season map with you when exploring the popular Callaghan Valley area. A 1:50,000 map covering the Callaghan valley, Squamish-Cheakamus Divide, and the Rainbow Mountain and Mt Sproat areas highlights trails, routes and descents for winter and summer adventures. A second 1:30,000 map provides more detail for the upper Callaghan Valley area. The maps have 25m contours and shaded relief, as well as hike and traverse descriptions.
name: Clark Geomatics Callaghan Valley Area Map-2nd Ed.
